explains: v. 感知；认为；领会（perceive 的过去式和过去分词）
wordGroup: perceived value 感知价值；知觉价值
perceived quality 感知质量；品质认知度

sentences.en: They were widely perceived to have been unlucky.
sentences.cn: 人们普遍认为他们的运气不佳。

sentences.en: She is perceived as vain, spoiled, and promiscuous.
sentences.cn: 她被认为是个虚荣、娇生惯养、淫乱的女人。

sentences.en: Stress is widely perceived as contributing to coronary heart disease.
sentences.cn: 压力普遍被认为能造成冠心病。
